attributes.title: No. Just, No!
attributes.review: This app is so bad I legitimately can’t stand to have it on my phone! It slows down my phone, drains the battery, and takes up too much storage. This is terrible, I thought our leader would do better 😡

attributes.title: I hate this
attributes.review: So I went to the school Next to my house then I saw this app so I downloaded it and the my phone cried for 100 days .

attributes.title: just not it 🧚🏽✨
attributes.review: 10/10 do NOT recommend. this app caused many glitches to my cellular device. i thought it would enrich my life greatly. i could not have been more wrong. truly disappointed 😔.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: As soon as I got the app my phone started to act up. It soon spread to my tv and then even my microwave went insane. After this, my pet hippopotamus started to go into heat shock from the increased radiation of the microwave. Terrible app. Do not download or bad luck will follow.

attributes.title: Horrible horrible horrible
attributes.review: The app crashes constantly and when it does work it takes super long and makes my phone slow it's terrible

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I don’t know if it’s a glitch or something but it was a picture of an Oompa Loompa saying vote for him to be president, then they started calling me telling me that all lives matter unless they aren’t white men... it was an awful experience

attributes.title: Bad app🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: This app takes all my money I’m really disappointed in Apple most of y’all don’t know but Donald Trump sent his nudes on this app and I don’t think it’s good for kids can you please take this down it’s really making us uncomfortable 🤮

attributes.title: helen keller couldn’t see this💖✨ good for her✨🧚🏼‍♂️💖
attributes.review: this app is terrible for the soul. I hate it. It looks tacky and sticky. It gave me a brain tumor. It made my dog die. Now I gotta pay my medical bills and for a candle to cover up the smell of dead dog in my backyard. This is ✨cancerous✨ I hope it is removed immediately.

attributes.title: ✨no❤️✨
attributes.review: i thought this was the new subway surfers game but turns out it’s just a racist billionaires sorry attempt to become orange hitler. DO NOT GET THIS APP. It also killed my pet dinosaur! i left my phone in my room and when i came back my phone was attacking him! r.i.p. Stonky 😔

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER ISTG
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app to keep up w my ginormous orange whale and it was the worst!! it made my mcdonald’s chicken nugget crumb fall on the ground!! AND it made my moms, aunt, great grandmas, mail mans, sons, DOGS piece of hair FELL off! what is this?! torture i SAYYYY. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP UNLESS U WANT YOUR moms, great grandmas, mail mans, son, dogs piece of hair to fall off!! #justiceforthemailmanssondog😡😡😡😪😪😪😪😤😤😢😢😢😢

-gen z
